name: ParaGame Deluxe Edition
description:
You have moved to a new, rented apartment where inexplicable things happen.

HOW TO PLAY?

The apartment has video surveillance cameras with which you will monitor what is happening. If you find something strange, mystical or shocking - immediately report it to a special service. But be careful! In the case of false messages, a special service may blacklist you, which will lead to a sad outcome. Inattention is the key to defeat ..

At your disposal will be only five cameras that you have to switch during the game to fix inexplicable, or mystical things. You need to be careful to detect the paranormal, and speed to respond in a timely manner to what is happening. There are a lot of rooms, but you are one :)

CONTROLS UP/Downselect cameraEswitch cameraESCtoggle menu LINKS Youtube
Patreon
PATREON ACCESS

If you liked the game consider leaving a review and a comment.
